lead_paragraph: In a generation of golfers 35 and under, several men seem poised to win their first major tournament as the P.G.A. Championship closes out the year's majors.
snippet: In a generation of golfers 35 and under, several men seem poised to win their first major tournament as the P.G.A. Championship closes out the year's majors.
